name: Assassin's Creed Online: Alliance
summary: Assassin's Creed Online: Alliance is an online mobile game set in Italy's Renaissance, developed by Ubisoft's partner, Ourpalm, for the Chinese market. Announced at the ChinaJoy 2016 expo, the game is set to allow you to explore cities such as Florence and Rome as you work your way up and join the Assassins or Templars. The game is also set to include Player vs. Player (PvP) functionality, allowing players to assassinate other players.
